document.full_text: u.c.l.a.'s victory against michigan state was the latest example of the bruins' uncanny ability to turn a sure win into a near loss.
document.title: southeast: u.c.l.a. 78, michigan state 76: for u.c.l.a., nail-biting is part of the experience
